channel.description: Recent content in Timestamp on Simple Solution

item.title: Convert SQL Timestamp into Joda-Time DateTime and Vice Versa in Java
item.description: In this Joda-Time tutorial, we learn how to convert an SQL Timestamp object into Joda-Time’ DateTime object and vice versace from Joda-Time’s DateTime into a Timestamp in Java. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Add Joda Time library to your Java project To use Joda Time Java library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. compile group: 'joda-time', name: 'joda-time', version: '2.
